column1: * 1932 - R.W. Chambers sends J.R.R. Tolkien an inscribed copy of Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to George Burke Johnston.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien is Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien concerning the election to the Oxford Poetry chair.
* 1981 - The twelfth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1992 - The Tolkien Phenomenon ends in wikipedia:Turku
* 2004 - Understanding The Lord of the Rings is published.
* 2014 - Beowulf Launch Party hosted by The Tolkien Society and Middle-earth Network with support from Tolkien Brasil and The Tolkienist.
:There are no known events for this day.Category:Datesfi:24. toukokuuta
